service.name: ABSTUDY School Term Allowance
service.description: ABSTUDY School Term Allowance (STA) is a payment that is paid to the applicant for students who qualify for Schooling A to assist with expenses associated with equipping the student for school, e.g. uniforms, textbooks and materials. STA is available for secondary students under 16 living at home or not eligible for the away from home, independent or pensioner rates, and primary school students aged 14 at 1 January in the year of study. Home schooled and distance education students also qualify for School Term Allowance even though they do not physically attend at an education institution.
